roleset.name: expand and contract; in an up and down or on and off manner
roleset.note: PULSE-V NOTES: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Member of VNcls modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3. (from pulse.01-v)
PULSE-N NOTES: Based on Temprel data. Comparison to pulse.01. Pulse.01-v is a member of VN class modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3. No FNclass. Framed by Katie. (from pulse.01-n)

example.name: up and down pulsing
example.text: Hildr's heart pulsed faster when she ran her finger over the carvings.
example.arg: when she ran her finger over the carvings.

example.name: on and off example
example.text: The cherry ref slug on the end of the iron pulsed as if alive.
example.arg: on the end of the iron

example.name: reason for arg 2
example.text: Anger swept through Dante and music pulsed while hot at his core.

example.name: The peripheral pulse is the series of waves of arterial pressure caused by left ventricular systoles as measured in the limbs. This is to be considered an extension of arg 1
